system.requirements:
Ratling Comrade, Agility 40
Apt: Agility, Finesse
system.descriptionText: Character can use Order after inflicting damage on an enemy with an attack. If Comrade is in Cohesion, the damaged enemy must make a +0 Toughness Test, if failed they are Stunned for one Round.

description.value: Character can use Order after inflicting damage on an enemy with an attack. If Comrade is in Cohesion, the damaged enemy must make a +0 Toughness Test, if failed they are Stunned for one Round.
